channel.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) on DLT-META
channel.description: Recent content in Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) on DLT-META

item.title: Execution
item.description: Q. How do I get started ? Please refer to the Getting Started guide Q. How do I create metadata DLT-META ? DLT-META needs following metadata files: Onboarding File captures input/output metadata Data Quality Rules File captures data quality rules Silver transformation File captures processing logic as sql Q. What is DataflowSpecs? DLT-META translates input metadata into Delta table as DataflowSpecs Q. How many DLT pipelines will be launched using DLT-META?

item.title: General
item.description: Q. What is DLT-META ? DLT-META is a solution/framework using Databricks Delta Live Tables aka DLT which helps you automate bronze and silver layer pipelines using CI/CD. Q. What are the benefits of using DLT-META ? With DLT-META customers needs to only maintain metadata like onboarding.json, data quality rules and silver transformations and framework will take care of execution. In case of any input/output or data quality rules or silver transformation logic changes there will be only metadata changes using onboarding interface and no need to re-deploy pipelines.
